title: How do I submit a ticket?
body: I need to submit a ticket and add a game log so tech support can help diagnose my recent lag issue but I'm only finding FAQ's and troubleshooting problems.  I need to get directed to the actual submit ticket page that allows me to upload a game log.  Pretty please :)

replies.body: Sorry you were having a hard time finding the ticket page! You'll be able to shoot them that ticket by clicking here -> [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
